mapper.select: SELECT boardSeq, writer, content, targetId, refGroup, commentGroup, regdate FROM boardComment WHERE refGroup=#{boardSeq} ORDER BY commentGroup ASC, boardSeq ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boardComment (boardSeq, writer, content, targetId, refGroup, commentGroup, regdate) VALUES(#{boardSeq}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{targetId}, #{refGroup}, #{commentGroup}, SYSDATE)
